extendedInfo.description: If you are Lil Wayne's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Lil Wayne's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Lil Wayne's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Lil Wayne's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Tha Block Is Hot- Lights Out- 500 Degreez- Tha Carter- Tha Carter II- Like Father, Like Son- Tha Carter III- Rebirth- I Am Not A Human Being- Tha Carter IV- I Am Not A Human Being II-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- -
